body.p: The purpose of this topic, its associated DITA Map, and the corresponding targets in the build.xml is to verify that the Harmonized DocTools Platform is configured correctly. When a new DocSet repo is created, it can be tested immediately by running the sample-pdf target in the build.xml file. You may delete this topic, map, and targets if you feel you no longer need them, or you can leave them in a repo to verify that your installation is capable of a base level of functionality.
